news.title: FSF Europe newsletter
news.body: Topics: Ciaran O'Riordan working full-time for FSFE, IFSO becoming associate organisation, WIPO IIM on "Development Agenda", FSFE office in Hamburg, Fellowship SmartCards being sent out, Freedom party in Milano, Teaching the World Bank, FSF Latin America on its way, Nordic University Computer Club Conference in Sweden, Alessandro Rubini speaks at University in Lecce, Web pages translated to 14 languages.
